entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.9°C

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
